website_summaries.verdict: The first of its kind. Finally enjoy the bold, long-lasting effects of liquid liner on your waterline.
pros: Designed to provide all the boldness of a liquid liner on your waterline
Soft, lip-gloss style applicator is gentle on eyelids and waterline
Just one dip into the bottle gets enough product to fully cover your waterline
Color is more pigmented and longer lasting than traditional pencil liners
cons: Takes longer than average to dry, especially on the waterline

customer_reviews.title: Transfer is unavoidable
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t work for me. The wet line transfer was immediate even after my 15 second open eye wait. This would be ok as a top eyeliner if it were truly waterproof but seems too gunky. I’m actually wondering if I received a knockoff since it was such a disappointing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Wakawaka

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This stuff BURNS!! Does not stay on water line of my lids. It came right off and got all over my eye and I had to throw my contact lenses away. I’ll stick to pencils now.
customer_reviews.author: Carla B

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long, difficult applicator
customer_reviews.text: I love how long this lasts and how bold the black color is, however I’m not fond of how thick the applicator brush is (which is why it gets 4 stars). This makes it hard for me to taper my application.
customer_reviews.author: NKMc

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t stay on 10 min
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy. My dollar eye liner stays on longer than this expensive stuff I don’t have the packaging or I’d send it back.
customer_reviews.author: jeanine green

customer_reviews.title: I had difficulty applying on the waterline.
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product the bare minimum because it arrived on time. I could not use product because it would sting and I could not get the hang of it. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: melinda woods

customer_reviews.title: I choose pretty eyes...
customer_reviews.text: Omg, I love this eyeliner! I love that it stays put, it doesn't smudge or have me looking like a raccoon at the end of my day. If your wanting to stay looking fresh all day, this is your product! People, decide....pretty eyes or raccoon eyes...your choice.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie E. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: may as well buy maybelline!
customer_reviews.text: Not water proof, within 20 minutes it is under my eyes. The applicator is brilliant the product is too watery. I expected better. Cheap drugstore is longer lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie M

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: I was told this was going to be awesome for the inner eye. The applicator is terrible, it leaks onto the skin, and does not stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany garrett

customer_reviews.title: Did not stay on my waterline
customer_reviews.text: I have never found an eyeliner that stays put on my waterline so, I was eager to try this since it was made especially for the waterline. I was quickly disappointed and will be returning this since it was more than $25.
customer_reviews.author: AandAsMomma

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, great quality vegan and cruelty free!
customer_reviews.text: Love Kat Von D vegan and cruelty free products! This liner held up to its promise!
customer_reviews.author: Mavis Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner for waterline ever!
customer_reviews.text: The best and easiest application I have ever had for the waterline. Stayed on all day. Superb!!!
customer_reviews.author: hoosierreview

customer_reviews.title: Better than eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lash liner. Super long lasting and much easier to put on than eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda

customer_reviews.title: stays on all day!!  I would give it five stars if the applicator was slimmer.
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner works great on the lower lash line. It doesn't smear and lasts all day. Beware because it goes on thickly. I use a q-tip to straighten it out after I put it on. It's no big deal, but if there was a thinner applicator I wouldn't have to do that step.
customer_reviews.author: Thatcher50

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay on!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great when you put it on but it doesn't stay on for more than 10 minutes! I look like a racoon shortly after putting it on! :( I fan my eye for about 15 seconds to hopefully let it dry before I move on to my other eye... nothing is working.
customer_reviews.author: Gail A. Stroker

customer_reviews.title: Not Easy to Apply
customer_reviews.text: It’s difficult to apply. Honestly, I haven’t applied it well yet, and I’m intimidated by it because it looks like I’ll just end up with black in my eyeball.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda D

customer_reviews.title: I can’t believe it actually works!
customer_reviews.text: As with other liners my expectations were pretty low that this one would actually work. Boy was I ever wrong. I’ve put this liner through the paces and it exceeded my expectations by a mile. I hope they never discontinue this liner.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel T.

customer_reviews.title: One of a kind
customer_reviews.text: Most of these reviews seem to be a user error more than the product being bad...Of course if you get any liquid make up in your eye its going to BURN! Duh. We've all poked ourselves in the eye with mascara and didn't it burn? Duh. I love this stuff...I put it on after i do all my makeup including my mascara, let it set/dry and boom its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Puebla

customer_reviews.title: Defines eyes
customer_reviews.text: No need for messy eyeliner. Really defunds eyes. Bought 5
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Horribleeeeeeee
customer_reviews.text: Mine came cracked, the bottle was actually cracked open there was eye liner all over
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Spada

product_meta.title: KAT VON D Lash Liner Liquid Inner Eyeliner
product_meta.description: Introducing the first liquid liner for your waterline.* Lash Liner revolutionizes the way you line your eyes with an innovative, new, long-wear, water-resistant formula, specially designed for a notoriously difficult area to get extreme pigment payoff that lasts. Finally, get all of the intensity of a liquid eyeliner, without any of the running, smudging, or raccoon-eye effect associated with traditional pencil waterliners. Lash Liner glides on and quickly dries down for all-day performance. Lash Liner’s Hybrid Fluid-Gel formula contains clay binding ingredients for a richer texture than a standard liquid liner. This unique formulation is designed to stand up to watery eyes. This super-pigmented formula will set in as little as 15 seconds for transfer-resistant, long wear. Lash Liner’s soft-tip applicator is custom designed to hold the perfect amount of formula, so you can instantly intensify any eye look with extreme precision and ease.
feature_bullets: KAT VON D Lash Liner Liquid Inner Eyeliner A first-of-its-kind, long-wearing, water-resistant liquid eyeliner specially designed for the waterline.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
